keyMappings:
# Colemak Navigation (n-e-i-h)
unmap n
unmap e
unmap i
unmap h
map n scrollDown
map e scrollUp
map i scrollRight
map h scrollLeft

# Search (mapped to j/J because n/N are used for navigation)
unmap j
unmap J
map j performFind
map J performBackwardsFind

# Tabs (mapped to N/E)
unmap N
unmap E
map N nextTab
map E previousTab

# Scrolling and Top/Bottom (mapped to k/K and l)
unmap k
unmap K
unmap l
map k scrollToBottom
map K scrollToTop
map l enterInsertMode

# Consistency with your C-p/C-e toggle
unmap <c-p>
unmap <c-e>
map <c-p> scrollDown
map <c-e> scrollUp
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia,
# as
# well as for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
